# Anvil

> Open-source multi-agent platform that modernizes legacy code (COBOL, Perl, Fortran) into production-grade Java Spring Boot.

## Overview

Anvil is a CLI tool and multi-agent system that reads legacy source code, understands the business logic through AI analysis, and generates modern, idiomatic Java Spring Boot applications.

## Key Features

- Multi-agent pipeline: Cartographer, Specular, Architect, Judge
- Supports COBOL, Perl, and Fortran as source languages
- Generates Java Spring Boot with proper type mapping
- Works offline with template-based generation (LLM optional)
- Built on Temporal.io for production-grade orchestration

## Quick Start

```bash
go install github.com/efebarandurmaz/anvil/cmd/anvil@latest

anvil run --source cobol --target java \
    --input ./your-cobol-src \
    --output ./generated-java
```
